title: Video: Love Dance – Skisse #3
content:
There’s something oddly beautiful about the coast.

The feeling of starring out towards a vast expanse of stunning nothingness can’t be matched; it’s freedom with unlimited potential or consequence. This new video from Norway dream-pop group Love Dance exploits this emotion through hazy shots of idyllic cliffs and crashing waves, almost as if envisioning an alternate reality. Skisse #3 is a shoegaze inspired number, drawing comparisons to the likes of Ride and Pale Saints, yet with a modern pop twist. Check it out below.

Love Dance – Skisse #3 from IncreaseThePeace on Vimeo.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
